Header.title: Balance Confirmation
Header.paragraph: India’s first and only online platform to manage your confirmations on click

About.paragraph: NAKAD is led by Ujwal Kalra, Sambhav Jain and Avinash Uttav who come from rich background of IIT-IIMs. Mr Kalra hails from a family of Chartered Accountants with his father serving as the Ex-Chairman of MMTC. Recognizing the challenges in reconciliation across industries, Ujwal along with his co-founders developed RECON360, an AI-ML enabled platform. It automates AR and AP reconciliation, providing a one-stop dashboard for ledger discrepancies, streamlining the process, and enhancing dispute resolution. Join us in revolutionizing reconciliation. Our mission is to leverage technology to empower the Accounts Team, helping them boost their net profits by preventing revenue leakages. Developing touchless balance confirmation and ledger reconciliation software capable of automatically confirming critical data points and identifying potential revenue leakages
